mapper.select: select aci.card_no as card_no ,aci.card_name as card_name from account_card_info aci

select concat(substring(acse.ymd, 1, 4), '.', substring(acse.ymd, 5, 2), '.', substring(acse.ymd, 7, 2)) as ymd ,concat(substring(acse.times, 1, 2), ':', substring(acse.times, 3, 2), ':', substring(acse.times, 5, 2)) as times ,acse.approv_num ,acse.card_no ,acse.card_nm ,acse.usage_cd ,acse.usage_nm ,(select asd.attribute03 from account_setting_detail asd where asd.header_id = 4 and asd.code = acse.usage_cd) as usage_color ,acse.amount ,acse.remark from account_card_statement_exceltmp acse where acse.excelfile_id = #{fileId} order by acse.ymd, acse.times
select file_id as fileId ,file_name as fileName from account_import_file where file_type = #{fileType}

select concat( substr(x.ymd, 1, 4), '-', substr(x.ymd, 5, 2), '-', substr(x.ymd, 7, 2) ) as ymd ,concat( substr(x.times, 1, 2), ':', substr(x.times, 3, 2) ) as times ,x.remark ,x.amount ,(select aci.card_name from account_card_info aci where aci.card_no = x.card_no) as cardNm from ( select a.ymd, a.times, a.remark, a.amount, a.card_no from ( select acs.ymd ,acs.times ,acs.remark ,acs.amount ,acs.card_no from account_card_statement acs order by acs.ymd desc, acs.times desc limit 5 ) a
union all
select b.ymd ,b.times ,b.remark ,b.amount ,b.card_no from ( select acss.ymd ,acss.times ,acss.remark ,acss.amount ,acss.card_no from account_card_statement_sms acss order by acss.ymd desc, acss.times desc limit 5 ) b ) x order by x.ymd desc, x.times desc limit 5
